snippet: Tony Parker scored 30 points, Tim Duncan had 27 points and 15 rebounds, and the host Spurs, in their first game since being fined $250,000 by the N.B.A., beat the Grizzlies, 99-95, in overtime.
abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs defeat Memphis Grizzlies, 99-95, in overtime; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 30 points, Tim Duncan had 27 points and 15 rebounds, and the host Spurs, in their first game since being fined $250,000 by the N.B.A., beat the Grizzlies, 99-95, in overtime.

headline.seo: Rested Stars Rally Spurs Past Grizzlies
headline.main: Rested Stars Rally Spurs Past Grizzlies
headline.print_headline: Rested Stars Rally Spurs Past Grizzlies
